person_041.name: JohnBillingsley
person_041.description: Wrote the Somerset volume for the Board of Agriculture county surveys. A founder of the Bath and West of England Society of which Davy was elected an honorary member in 1804.

person_105.name: ThomasPoole
person_105.description: Tanner based in Nether Stowey, philanthropist and essayist; a friend of Davy and Coleridge.

place_084.name: East Lothian
place_084.description: A district in Scotland with Haddington as its capital.
